Package gw.plugin.email

Interface IEmailTemplateSource

All Superinterfaces:
InternalPlugin, Remote
public interface IEmailTemplateSource extends InternalPlugin
Interface description...
Author:
bjohnson

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IEmailTemplateDescriptor
    getEmailTemplate(ILocale locale, String strTemplateFilename)
    Returns the email template for the template filename.
    IEmailTemplateDescriptor
    getEmailTemplate(String strTemplateFilename)
    Returns the email template for the template filename.
    IEmailTemplateDescriptor[]
    getEmailTemplates(ILocale locale, Map valuesToMatch)
    Returns an array of email templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
    IEmailTemplateDescriptor[]
    getEmailTemplates(String strTopic, String[] keywords)
    Returns an array of email templates that satisfy the specified criteria.

  • Method Details

    • getEmailTemplates

      IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(String strTopic, String[] keywords)
      Returns an array of email templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      strTopic - The email topic. If null, returns templates w/o regard to topic.
      keywords - An array of keywords for selective searching.
      Returns:
      An array of email templates matching the specified criteria.

    • getEmailTemplates

      IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(ILocale locale, Map valuesToMatch)
      Returns an array of email templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      locale - the locale to generate the email for
      valuesToMatch - An map of name values to match
      Returns:
      An array of email templates matching the specified criteria.

    • getEmailTemplate

      IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(String strTemplateFilename)
      Returns the email template for the template filename.
      Parameters:
      strTemplateFilename - The template filename.
      Returns:
      A email template instance corresponding to the specified template filename.

    • getEmailTemplate

      IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(ILocale locale, String strTemplateFilename)
      Returns the email template for the template filename.
      Parameters:
      locale - the locale to generate the email for
      strTemplateFilename - The template filename.
      Returns:
      A email template instance corresponding to the specified template filename.
